website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you like its expandable design and comfort features, but it has some flaws.
pros: Has plushy soft flooring, padded sides, and an adjustable shoulder strap
Stands out for its ability to expand for leg space or to accommodate two pets
cons: The structure is somewhat flimsy, and may not be ideal for airline travel
It has the tendency to lose its shape

customer_reviews.title: Poor design for cleaning
customer_reviews.text: After using this item now and needing to clean inside flooring mats it is NOT a terrific product. All other carriers all the mats are removable. This product only lets you remove the center may the fold down side mats are not able to be removed for cleaning. This is not good when your pet gets sick or has a accident.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Milewski

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this carrier but I was so disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this carrier but I was so disappointed. I cannot fault the idea but the execution is awful. The floor has no solid base so the center leg juts straight through the soft base. But worst of all, the only support and rigid structure it has is on the sides so even when fully assembled in carrier mode, the center length just collapses!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wozza

customer_reviews.title: is perfect! He has more than enough room when is ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one to write a review, but this one definitely deserves it. I have a 17 pound Italian greyhound that doesn't fit in most carriers due to his long legs. This one, however, is perfect! He has more than enough room when is expended and can still fit decently when its not. He's too tall to stand up in it - as most dogs are - but you can always unzip the top to give them more space, in case they want to stand. I definitely recommend it, specially for those with dogs that are a bit bigger. My dog loves it and the quality is good!
customer_reviews.author: Juliana

customer_reviews.title: Big fat cat liked the extra stretch room
customer_reviews.text: I used this to bring my cat from Jacksonville to LA. On Southwest airlines it had a hard time fitting under the front seat and only had room to open one side. Later i realized you can take out the 4 support poles and it can compact more. It really is a great design and allows my 15lb fat cat to really stretch out.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Well Designed for Skardie Cats
customer_reviews.text: These carriers are OUTSTANDING 🤗. Transported three feral cats to the Vet for neuter/notch/return. Simple loading, either top or front access. Rugged mesh & zippers; withstood clawing & a few gnaws. Easy to clean from acccidents. The deep pockets hold & protect documents. Freed up hands when carrying! Handle cover is a nice touch; gentler on hands with no digging in. Will order several more for the house cats. These carriers are roomy, especially with the sides extended. Great as an emergency evacuation kennel for shelter stays.
customer_reviews.author: Telynau

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this carrier! I have 2 growing quick 8 month old kitties. When they were 6 mo old (when I originally got the carrier) they fit perfectly with the sides closed in. Now that they're bigger, they "fit" with the sides zipped uip but they're on top each other. I let the sides out as soon as I get them the car and then they have plenty of room. So kitties are squished a little but for about the 2 min walk from the house to the car. It's got a lot of life left in it so we'll see how big the kitties will get and how long I can use it to carry both
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: For 10-13 plus-pounds and well behaved
customer_reviews.text: TSA approved, expandable both sides, zippers slide easily, extra ventilation...highly recommended for a well behaved small dog... 10-14 pounds, a daschun or even an Italian greyhound... well-made product .
customer_reviews.author: suzanne

customer_reviews.title: So versatile and well made!
customer_reviews.text: This this is so versatile. It has plenty of room for two cats and is especially great for traveling because you can exspand it out and give them. More room without letting them roam around the car. It has a pad in the bottom for comfort and so many different ways to zip it up to separate the cats if needed. It's also sturdy and doesn't crush down on the cats. Really cool carrier at a fabulous price! Update. My daughter uses this for her cats A LOT. they like how they can spread out while traveling in the car due to easy opening sides that give it more room.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Wade

customer_reviews.title: Every Cat's Dream..
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this carrier..she is going to ride in this when we go on vacation.. it will keep her safe in the truck, then at night I will open it totally up and she will sleep in it while staying in the motorhome. Made really well, and it's cute. My rag doll cat is going to love traveling!! Update...we used this in our truck for a 5 day trip with our cat, she loved it, at night we put it in the motor home so she could sleep in it...she did fantastic!!! We will use it again at Christmas on our last trip for 2017...she loved it ..so we loved it, best money spent!!!
customer_reviews.author: GamingLadyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Poor Mesh Design
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is beautiful, and really well made. The inside faux fur is so soft, and my cat loved it. However, the mesh on the front and top of the carrier was probably not the best choice of material for cats. My cat was going to end up tearing the mesh with his claws after just one trip to the vet. I ended up returning this product before it got damaged and I would have had to purchase something else anyways. Maybe if you have a calm cat that doesn't mind the car rides this would be fine, but my little guy was pushing his head up into the mesh and this just was not the carrier for him.
customer_reviews.author: z0rra

customer_reviews.title: 100% Amazing - Best Travel Dog carrier
customer_reviews.text: She looks sad but that's her face lol, she LOVES this thing, Seven (yes that's her name) is a "snowdog" so she travels to sunny Florida during the winters and summers in Canada - so much space for her under the seat, the top is mesh as well as most of the bag once opened up, like a mini dog mansion for her to chill while on flight - 100% amazing, she's about 13lbs and it's perfect for her
customer_reviews.author: M. L

customer_reviews.title: Love at first sight
customer_reviews.text: My cat HATES / LOVES this thing! He loves how soft and all the windows offered but hates being locked in the carrier. The opening at the top of this carrier makes it very easy to place him into the carrier and go about our vet visit or etc. The pocket on the side makes it great to keep paperwork, treats or even portable water dish in. Also the strap used for what I assume is used to attach to a suitcase handle pull, I use in the car to keep him from sliding I don't have any cons really for this carrier. Just pros
customer_reviews.author: Chantelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Carrier
customer_reviews.text: I needed a carrier to bring a 19 pound Rottweiler puppy back to California from Michigan. This carrier filled the bill. The flop down sides gave the puppy room to stretch out during the trip. The carrier is very well made. Just a note not all airline seat are created equal. The carrier fit well under the regional jets seats but not the long haul jet's first class aisle seats. Maybe the window seat would have been different.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette Winder

customer_reviews.title: Good product..
customer_reviews.text: I like this product but they put two stick inside for not bend when you hang it to your shoulder, that sticks day by day tearing the front and back side and keep dropping on the floor.. So when you bored to keep put it back, you lost them some where at home like me.. And your product does not seen you perfect anymore because without that sticks, you bend the bag when you hold from the holders and your pet does not comfortable sitting in it like before..
customer_reviews.author: Zuhal TUNC

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be happier! I have a 9
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier! I have a 9.6lb Yorkshire. She can stand up, move 360, it is super comfortable, lots of space, plenty of zippers so I can play with her during the flight and it is not heavy. I didn't want a bag that she needed to lay down all the time. I bought one before jetsitter that had wheels, but not all airlines accept bags with wheels. Now I'm safe! Super happy with jetsitter!
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: A+ Cat Carrier
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is the best. It’s soft and comfortable for my cat. I like that it has a clip that I can attach to her collar or harness to so I can have the top open while I drive and she stays put. She doesn’t like to be enclosed, so this is a major plus because I can pet her while I am driving and it keeps her calm.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: So awesome, big and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This carrier went beyond my expectations! I had ordered another kind previously and this one was just so much more sturdier and bigger, not that the other one was bad, this was just nicer. The bottom has rods to keep it firm but also has a hard support under the middle pad. The side pads unzip separately from the net side panels. The pad is very soft and velvety feeling. It folds up really nicely too. Kitties really like it, and so do I.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Very cool design
customer_reviews.text: We bought two in advance of an airplane trip with our two 16 pound cats. We have used them to transport them in the car, and they seem durable enough to hold the cats. The size is good and all the places to see out is nice. Even showed off all the functionality at the Vet the other day, and everyone agreed it is a very cool design. The plane ride is still in front of us, I do feel pretty confident that this carrier will hold our cats safely, and fit under the seat. Now I pray the plane is on time...thank you for all the nice emails about your product. Good follow up.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: I was really excite about this product. I was using it fly a foster cat to his new home in Seattle with his new mom. Sadly it did not last even the car ride to the airport. The cat was able to tear it open and get out in the car. Thankfully it did not happen at the airport or in the airplane. The new mom had to stop for a new kennel on the way to the airport.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well-made- good value
customer_reviews.text: This carrier seems very sturdy and well-made, and the interior is very soft. The way they designed the zippers is very clever- you can open for access at the front, top, and even through the sides when they are folded out. You can also unzip the front and back panels to fold the whole thing flat. We bought ours mostly for trips to the vet (top access is a must with a cat who clings to the inside of the carrier!) but our cats also seem to love it as a 'cat cave' with the sides folded out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the better but still needs a little work
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag but I don't love it. The perks of the bag is netting is quality, color is good and I love the sides. The not so good is that it's sewn odd on top and I don't feel this is a large bag as described. Seems more like a medium. I've bought a lot of bags and this is probably my third favorite maybe fourth. I give it a 7.43
customer_reviews.author: J Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not airline approved due to size
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great and my dog loves it. Super durable and pretty too! The only downside is that it’s actually too big for fitting under the plane seat so I’m not sure that it truly classified as airline approved. My Dog is certified as ESA so she didn’t have to stay in it, but if youre paying to bring your dog on it’s required that they stay inside and for under the seat
customer_reviews.author: michala monroe

customer_reviews.title: Grrr put a damper on my trip
customer_reviews.text: Very upset. Purchased specifically for a Frontier flight to visit family for nine days. The second day of the visit my little Shih-zhu that weighs 9 lbs and just had his nails groomed, clawed his way out through netting and had a field day in our hosts' house. They keep their dogs kenneled when away from home. This made the visit difficult with no useable kennel to use. We patched it up for the flight home, and he clawed his way out during the flight. We had to hold it shut manually until we could land and get to our car. I was very angry about this. If my dog can claw out, any dog can.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Witherington

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value. Cats love it.
customer_reviews.text: Our two cats love it when it's expanded. When it's all closed up... ehhh, not so much. I think the ideal situation would be to have this one, plus a non-expanding one that has all mesh sides. The quality is great, great materials and construction. Looks attractive. I haven't needed to clean any "accidents" yet, but I'll safely assume that would be a pain in the butt no matter which carrier I got. All in all? Love it, would buy again. Very decent price for such a nice carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: This is THE carrier
customer_reviews.text: The color is so classy and clean which is reallly love. The eggnog and vanilla tones give it a very aesthetically pleasing personality and ASIDE from this its surprisingly SUPER STRONG & STURDY. Have ot used it yet though from the look and feel of it I know that BUCKLE STRAP wont yield for nobody! Also, this can fit 2 cats at once which is a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Very nice carrier
customer_reviews.text: This was a last minute purchase for my moms Chihuahua (10# or so). We were moving her from AZ to San Antonio, TX. The carrier was the right size, fit under the seat and the zipper sides made it VERY nice as it gave her a little more room to lay down, move around. I highly recommend it to anyone traveling with a small dog. le.
customer_reviews.author: Rory Derrick

customer_reviews.title: pet can stretch out while not on plane.
customer_reviews.text: A bit complicated to use with all the zippers, pads etc. However while your pet is not under the seat on the plane they can stretch out with either both or one side unzipped. Don't think it will last as long as my Sherpa brand but it's a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: I accepted that I just got a bad one and accepted it
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this item 2 times now. The first one I had issues with the zippers breaking and the netting unravelling just after a few months. I accepted that I just got a bad one and accepted it. I decided to purchase a second one as it is a attractive carrier and I liked the color. Once again the top zipper came off and the stitching is unraveling. Giving up!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good bag with some defects
customer_reviews.text: Solid, durable bag, with some defects. The metal rod bars weren't solidly sewn into the bag (I imagine to allow the bag to be folded), which meant that the rods could pop out and easily break through the small flaps closing them cutting into the mesh sides of the bag. Also, the zipper clasps easily came undone from the zipper which meant that the bag couldn't be closed. Bag can easily hold a 10lb animal, with enough room, though it's a bit tough to put it in small spaces. Good bag, but with the challenges, worth buying another, more durable bag.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT STAND UP WHEN DOOR OPEN
customer_reviews.text: THE CATS CANT GO IN AND OUT WITH DOOR OPEN IT COLLAPSED. GREAT CONCEPT BUT POURLY MADE TO USE ALL THAT I THOUGHT I WOULD E ABLE TO USE FOR. WIRING AROUND DOORS NOT STRONG ENOUGH TO STAND WHEN OPEN THERE FORE THE CATS CANT GO IN AND OUT. VERY DISSAPPOINTING BECUASE WE LOVED THE OPEN SIDES.
customer_reviews.author: malcom x

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My dog NEVER is in any type if crate/bag..a little cumbersome for because I am only 5ft 2 inches tall carrying a,12# dog a,little,awkward ...but, over all we,Love it . She has been in it from 8am to 1amarrival at airport ...dud,NOT get home til 7 pm (in the for 35 hrs. total time) the following morning because of airplane delays but, got for her to get potties break at the airport.. She was awesome when we slept at the airport was able to open the sides do she had more room to stretch. It did its job plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gives my dog extra room once on plane
customer_reviews.text: Fold-outs fit nicely under 'economy' section seats. Fly with girlfriend most of the time so middle seat works best so I can cheat on some leg-room. Carrier works well as a portable kennel waiting for planes, and once we're at destination. A bit of a pain closing up zippers on the inside, so I usually just leave open (there are two sets on each pop-up. Our 15lb Bennie recognizes carrier as an upcoming trip, and immediately crawls inside when we get out of closet! We upgraded to this carrier after suffering through a cheaper model that started falling apart after first trip.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Dart

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations and is very well made.
customer_reviews.text: This carrier exceeded my expectations. It is so well made and has so many additional features like the sides that lay out flat. My cat loves it so much I leave it out all the time and he enjoys spending time in it. I used it a few days ago to take him to the Vets and he is a big cat but it was very strong and did a good job of keeping him stable. The floor is hard and I don't care for the fleece floor covering so I've just covered it with a soft towel and now it is perfect! I would recommend this to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: VCB523

customer_reviews.title: Great bag choice for airline travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 to bring my 11 and 15 pound cats from Florida to Sweden. I took the bars out on the top and bottom so the bags were a bit more flexible and make sure the big cat was under the 18 pound limit. The bags are between 3.5 and 4 pounds. They didn't even weigh the cats of course. TSA thought the bags were awesome! I love how many options you have to unzip and get an unruly cat out. The bag didn't completely fit under Lufthansa's economy seats but our flight attendants didn't mind. Here are my babies hanging out in Germany on our layover. Totally worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Great for a long car trip
customer_reviews.text: I needed to bring two Labrabull puppies of about 15 pounds each from South Caroline to Maine in my fully-packed car. I chose this carrier as it gave them room to move about. They loved it, it did the job, and I have no complaint with it other than this: If it's already too big to fit under an airplane seat, then why not make it just a bit taller and wider? Bigger dogs like soft sided carriers as much as small ones.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth F.

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. Have not traveled with it yet, plan on flying in April. Love the way the sides come out so our 18 pound miniature schnauzer can stretch out. Also like being able to access him from the top, since there is a zip opening. If he feels any anxiety, I can unzip the top and reach in an pet him if necessary. This review is for the large one.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag For Medium size dogs
customer_reviews.text: Great size dog carrier for medium size dogs. I have a miniature bull terrier, he doesn't sleep in his bed anymore, he wants to sleep in this. We had our first flight not long ago since then he wants to stay in this to take a nap. i opened the both size for him to have more space, now he sleeps there thru the night. When i was in airport, the bag is sturdy to carry the dog on your shoulder. I really like this bag.
customer_reviews.author: e-nola

customer_reviews.title: Horribly Made
customer_reviews.text: It's very hard. Theres a legit piece of cheap wood on the bottom for "support"
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe and secure transportation.
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it on any trip yet. But the way it is made. Folds away neatly. And the cats love it. I have to give it a five. I was hoping to carry both cats but I think that will be too crowded for them. I'll be getting another one. The kids can see out all over. You have access from all sides. And the best part is you can open it up and it gives them a lot more room to just stretch out. At least my cats have class.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Carrier
customer_reviews.text: My 10 pound, senior, mini-doxie loved this carrier from Day 1. She was comfortable all zipped in on our 5 hour plane ride & loved being able to experience the "gazebo" effect when all opened up. Setting it on top of the wheel-around luggage pull-up handle was perfect. Once we had the Jet Sitter, we decided it would become her little den at home too. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my two kittens!
customer_reviews.text: This far exceeded my expectations on quality. The bed is super soft and the zippers are high quality. The kittens have made it part of their "fort". I don't see how it is the right size for an airplane, but excellent product none the less.
customer_reviews.author: debmich

customer_reviews.title: Love that the top and sides all zip down so ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this to transport my 10 lb dog across country, flying on both a puddle jumper and a larger plane (both United). I sat in a window seat and had enough room to slide the bag under the seat (it was a little trickier on the smaller plane) but don't know that you would have enough room with an aisle seat. Love that the top and sides all zip down so it was easy to get access to my pup if needed. My only complaint is that I wish the shoulder strap had more cushion. If you are covering long distances in the airport like I had to, the strap begins to dig after awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Dalbert

customer_reviews.title: This is super roomy and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: This is super roomy and looks nice. When you are actually carrying your pets you don't want to have the side extenders out because they are not sturdy, which is not a huge deal to me. I did mark it down a star because it didn't take too long for my kittens to bite through the mesh and make holes. Maybe an adult cat used to carriers wouldn't do that...but my kittens sure go to town on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Haffar

customer_reviews.title: and they fit comfortably in the carrier
customer_reviews.text: Whoever designed this is a genius! Our cats are bigger than average, and they fit comfortably in the carrier. We call the carriers "campers," because it's like those pop up campers. The bottom is very easy to clean after an accident. We are extremely pleased with these carriers and highly recommend them to anyone who likes to provide high quality carriers to their furbabies while offering them a little luxury.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A.

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with this purchase. I was looking for something durable and easy to use for trips with my cats. The zippers catch a lot, one even broke after two uses. You also have to open the carrier itself to unzip the fur lining and it doesn't attach to the expansion. I feel like this was a start of a good idea but fell short in following through. Since this purchase, I found another brand that is durable and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!! Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is so great! I have a 7lb toy poodle and he fits perfectly in the smaller size. It is great quality and I would definitely recommend. The interior is plush, and while my dog doesn't love it (why would he?) It seems that after a while he feels comfortable enough to lie down.
customer_reviews.author: MBHE

customer_reviews.title: Roomy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this carrier for my little dog. When we travel we open both sides so it spreads out and creates more room for him. Easy access to pass treats to him and top loader for putting him in. He seems to like it and gives no fuss when we are on road trips. Very durable and well made. I love the padding inside of it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie E

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size for Cat or Small  Dog
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 16 hour car ride because we were moving. Was looking for something spacious for my cat to sit in for the long ride. She was able to sprawl out no problem. Lots of leg room for her. Was able to also fit a water bowl in her carrier for her to drink. Stopped twice to stay overnight, the compartments were easily able to go back into the carrier so we could bring her inside to the hotel. Would definitely recommend for a cat or small dog.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Healey

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy for your money!
customer_reviews.text: Oddly enough my cat loves this carrier! We left it out and open for her to check it out and she started taking naps in it. When I took her to the Vet for the first time in it she climbed right back into it after the vet was done, and the seat belt straps are perfect so she didn't slide around at all while we were driving.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Stearns

customer_reviews.title: Slightly cramped for 11 lb kitty, but the wings allow for a little more stretching room.
customer_reviews.text: Four stars: the design is neat, and it doubles as a napping nook because my cat finds it interesting. I docked a star because it's not quite tall enough for my cat to stand up inside, and I thought a "medium-size" carrier probably should be. He's not any larger than the average male cat at ~11 lbs. However, I should allow that the cramped size may be unavoidable for a TSA-friendly carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: This is a great pet carrier
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pet carrier! My dog actually likes to sit in it at our office (as opposed to the last carrier we had) because I unzip the sides and she likes the fur and openess. I like the smaller doggie door option, which allows the carrier to maintain its shape. Its sturdy when you carry it. I don't normally write reviews but I wanted to share my love of this thing! *If I can offer some feedback to the company on future versions, I would suggest maybe the side flaps have fur attached to the inside instead of it being a separate lining, so when you unzip the flap the fur comes down with it.*
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is by far the most quality option I've tried. The entire interior is plush-lined and the bottom has enough cushion to be comfortable for my pet. The expandable sides are a true added bonus! I've ordered 2 carriers from this company, as my first carrier experienced issues with the Zipper. Sugar Loaf has a 1-year warranty, and they gave me a full refund for the carrier once I snapped a couple photos of the faulty zippers. Highly recommend for the quality and customer service!
customer_reviews.author: ALE

customer_reviews.title: The BEST carrier I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: The BEST carrier I’ve used. It is also beautiful! I always get compliments on the airport on it. The expandable part is the best part, and I usually have enough room to expand one of the sides out right by my feet while in flight. My kitty has long hair, and the floor of the carrier is kind of fleecy, so I put a towel down so she doesn’t get too hot. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Dixon

customer_reviews.title: I have a massive maine coon (16 pounds) that needs ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a massive maine coon (16 pounds) that needs to get on a plane. While it will be hard to squeeze him on any carrier that fits airplane measurements, this allows him to eventually stretch out when the sides are open. The inside is soft and cozy. Thank you for this carrier!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: comfort for my cat and durability
customer_reviews.text: Loved the overall make of the carrier. Very durable and well stitched. We bought the gray and its a color is beautiful. The inside cushion in the main compartment is very good. I did purchase an additional orthopedic pillow....yes our cat is spoiled! Only suggestion...as many times as I open and close the compartments, I wonder if the zippers will hold up. Maybe more heavy duty zippers would work better and you could make them using accent colors. My cat would love Pink zippers on her gray carrier. Would definitely suggest this carrier to those who want their animals to travel in style!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Durable, practical, and cats love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. I did extensive research to try to find the best carrier. Bought 2 for my cats, one each color. I'm flying internationally in 2 months and I was scared if buying one not sturdy enough. The cats have already got used to the carriers, they love them and even sleep in the overnight. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Used it to travel with my Chihuahua. She was able to move around comfortably when closed for travel and at layovers I expanded it so she had more room . She was able to look around and still be safe in her confinement.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen planz

customer_reviews.title: I love this carrier!
customer_reviews.text: It's so open and my cat fits in it so well with extra room. I like being able to open one side and/or the other. I used this on my road trip and was able to buckle the carrier on the one side with the baggage strap. I do wish there was a way to attach the soft bottom to the openings when they are open but that's my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I will be taking my cat on a 36 hour total road trip as we move to our new home and wanted something she would feel safe in but could also stretch her legs. She loves sleeping in this carrier already, I leave it open on the floor and she enjoys taking naps inside. The carrier itself is as described, seems of a sturdy build, and fits my 8 lb cat wonderfully
customer_reviews.author: ✨K✨

customer_reviews.title: Well built carrier
customer_reviews.text: My dog and I both love this carrier. It is well made and cozy with the lining. I like how it can expand and give her room to stretch at our destination. It fits under a southwest flight but you need to remove the bars first, preferably at home. Wish it had pockets, but not a deal breaker. This travel case is a winner!
customer_reviews.author: NatashaM007

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got the large khaki to bring home our two newly adopted kittens. I was very impressed with the quality. The expandable sides will be great for road trips. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: The best pet carrier!
customer_reviews.text: This carrier exceeded my expectations. I was moving and wanted my cats to be as comfortable as possible for a long ride- they loved it! Its made extremely well, very roomy for them to stretch out, and super soft plush on bottom and sides. I bought 2 because this was the best one over many years i purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Faythe

customer_reviews.title: Pretty neat
customer_reviews.text: Its a pretty neat carrier. It is fairly sturdy, but not indestructable. The sides collapse in when you carry it. I guess that helps when trying to make it fit under an airplane seat. It seatbelts in to the car. My dog likes to jump in and out of it and hang out in it throughout the day, but does not like being closed up in it yet. It opens up on both sides so it is good when they need to stretch out in areas where they would have to stay closed up.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional pet carrier.
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and very functional pet carrier. I needed a new carrier to fly my cat that fit within Delta's size requirements. I can't speak for Pippa and say that she loved flying in it, but she didn't cry during the 2 hour flight. I liked that there is enough room for her to move around and I could carry her relatively easily and comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous carrier=happy kitten!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a little kitten I have to take to work with me. Perfect environment with the sides down. The liner is thick and cushiony, and love that it covers the side bottoms as well. Very well made, and the strap for luggage cart is such a great touch. This is the best carrier I’ve ever had and the price is excellent-will definitely buy another-thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Cats are lounging in it!
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace a carrier that got peed in and decided on this one. It has only been used for vet trips, so far. My girls are both about 11-1/2 lbs. It is plenty spacious to transport one in. I haven't used it to travel - hope I never have to! - so I can't attest to that. But I leave it in the family room with the sides expanded and they both like to lay in it.
customer_reviews.author: Di in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10 pound dog and this was just ever so slightly smaller than I expected. Works fine with the sides open but I'm afraid it will be a tight squeeze if I ever need this for a plane trip.
customer_reviews.author: crankycarrot

customer_reviews.title: I like this carrier as it can be seatbelted onto the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this carrier as it can be seatbelted onto the car seat. Many carriers have no way to seat belt them. My cat likes the fold out side "tent" as it gives her room to stretch out while traveling. Downside is the need to reach inside the carrier to unzip the fuzzy lining to put the side door down. Don't know why it was designed this way, but took my rating down a star.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great quality with room to stretch out!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! Left out for cats to investigate, they like it and even go in if they just want to chill. This is great before we take them on the plane so they won’t associate them in a negative way, they will feel safe, comfortable and protected!
customer_reviews.author: Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design and functional
customer_reviews.text: We had bought many carriers in the past. This is our favorite and our cat seems to agree. Loves to go in it by herself and she loves the extra space. Also very pretty design unlike other soft sided pet carriers we had. After a couple of weeks traveling, no tears or broken zippers yet. The carrier is also voluntarily used by our cat to sleep in when she wants to feel safe when there are visitors. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for 2 cats!
customer_reviews.text: Used this bad boy when we had to move our two cats from Texas to California and it was the best! It gave them enough room to both cuddle if they wanted to and give them their own space if they needed on the 22 hour trip! Great investment!
customer_reviews.author: ellen

customer_reviews.title: I have a very large cat who cannot fit in ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a very large cat who cannot fit in most carriers. The solder lining and two fold down compartment make this an item that I strongly urge others to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy clark

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pet carrier. I haven’t flown with it yet, but my pup fits in it, with enough room to stand and turn around. The netting is pretty dark, so I can’t see him as well as I’d like, but overall, I’m glad this is the carrier I purchased
customer_reviews.author: Jill Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly under seat and great for long airport stays (expands to add room)
customer_reviews.text: Recently used to bring cat from China to U.S. in cabin. Fit perfectly under seat and great for long airport stays (expands to add room). Easy to transport cat to/from vet appointments. Very cozy inside.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Mcmackle

customer_reviews.title: The Dog LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter's dog and he LOVES it! Alrhough he hasn't flown in it yet, he never wants to get put of it. She has a Cavalier King Charles and he has plenty of room to move around, even with the sides folded. The bars come out easily, so it will fit comfortably under the airplane seat.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie S.

customer_reviews.title: Cool carrier - Pretty Light weight too
customer_reviews.text: Im still waiting for my pup to come home next month. This will be purrrfect for her. She is a mini doxen so this will be good for small pets. She is going to ride in style! Please note toy and pink star blanket sold separately. This also feels sturdy like it will hold up for a while as long as the mesh doesnt rip
customer_reviews.author: Folkar1984

customer_reviews.title: Lite weight and my puppy loves it
customer_reviews.text: Lite weight and my dog loves it..my 7lb puppy crawled into it about 20 minutes after we got it. Sadly though while it was completely open my puppy chewed on the zipper on the lining and now we can't zip the lining all the way up. I would suggest that the lining be attached to the inside of the bag so that they can not chew it. I will be sewing the lining to the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zippers are great and there’s even a zipper to open the netting ...
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves this! He’s a nine pound mix breed and has plenty of room. We also open the sides and it a very comfy bed for him. Very well made. Zippers are great and there’s even a zipper to open the netting on the expandable sides! Very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: mia

customer_reviews.title: to small for my dog it said it would fit ...
customer_reviews.text: to small for my dog it said it would fit a twenty pound dog it does not no room to move around they have to lay flat and can barely turn around with some difficulty would not buy again but im sure if you have a quite smaller dog it might work for you
customer_reviews.author: kristie

customer_reviews.title: Great Traveller
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. However the large traveler was too small for my Standard Schnauzer. He is 18lbs but very tall. It did not really fit under the American Airlines airplane seat, unless I completely compressed it. Nonetheless is is a great car traveller. My dog can lay in it comfortably, he’s just to tall to stand up in it and close it.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: We love it and so does Dallas!
customer_reviews.text: We love it and so does Dallas! It came all folded up. As we opened it up we liked it more and more because we could see the possibilities this awesome carrier entails! The bedding is super soft. Not only do the sides expand but can be unzipped half way for easy access to enter or exit. We've left ours open for Dallas to warm up to. He was drawn to it right away and it is his new napping spot. We are all ready to take him in style from place to place.
customer_reviews.author: Shea

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, light-weight and very stylish
customer_reviews.text: Our new puppy loves this crate! We unexpectedly had to spend the night after picking up our mini Aussiedoodle in SC due to a ruptured tire from a pothole on the interstate. He slept comfortably (at least for 4 hours!) in his crate the first night with us with friends..the fact that the sides are expandable is brilliant, and I know he will enjoy many plane rides and nights away from home with us in this comfortable, portable crate.
customer_reviews.author: flwalker

customer_reviews.title: Pup approved
customer_reviews.text: Great carrier. The only downside to it is that it is too long to fit under the Delta seat (even the Comfort+ ones) so you need a window seat. It would be better if it were 16 or 17" long instead of 18". I love that the bars can be taken out of the top so part of it will slide under the seat but it doesn't collapse on the dog. Also, the strap to go over your carry-on handle is a wonderful addition.
customer_reviews.author: CJW

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this carrier!!! I haven't use it on my cat yet but I it looks so comfy I can't wait for him to try! I bought the small size (18"x11"x11") and it is bigger than expected. This carrier seems so comfortable I know that it will make traveling with my cat much easier. Also, loved the fact that it can expand on both sizes. I've always seen carriers as some kind of prison for my cat, and hated when I put him in there but this way I will not be sad when I'm traveling with him!!
customer_reviews.author: H.A.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Well made, lots of small details. straps, place to store water and food, leash and collapsible food/drink balls etc. Very well thought after. Super modular. Washes in the laundry on gentle cycle cold - comes out like new every time.
customer_reviews.author: CheeseMaker

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about this product and it delivered and functioned exactly as described. However.. within hours of a test run, my 7 pound morkie chewed/damaged the inner plastic zipper line. It was impossible to completely seal and zip the inner lining after that. Fortunately, it had two zippers, so I zipped up the second zipper up to the damaged part. This was used for a southwest flight.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: What a Great Idea
customer_reviews.text: I love this case for air travel. Any time we are not actually on the plane this case opens up for a more spacious temporary home for our 8-lb York. It's sturdy, it looks good and our baby doesn't hate it. That's a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Goodall

customer_reviews.title: Really nicely made.
customer_reviews.text: Really nicely made...! It is designed really well and super comfy... However, my 20 lbs dog was too large to fit comfortably but I would recommend it for smaller dogs, maybe up to 12 lbs... It is really cushy!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie J. Kilburg

customer_reviews.title: Pet loves it and pretty/stylish! 3.5*
customer_reviews.text: Pet loves it, has a hay day playing in and around it!! Functional and appealing to eye. Feel however quality isn't as high as Mr. Peanut brand (locking zippers etc). Bonus to have carpet that fans out into sides. Structurally ... wish the sides that fan out had more integrity & form. They cave in, so not as much room as looks.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Ferret loves it!
customer_reviews.text: It is wonderful. My ferrets love it, I can transport them long distances with this carrier. When we get in the car, I seat belt it in and place a litter box in one of the fold out sides. It works great! I have used this carrier numerous times. The only think I would change, is that the plush liner in the sides be removable for washing.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Friend

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was more durable
customer_reviews.text: Sadly it's not that durabble. I bought this in October & now (December) it's slowly starting to loose its form. It doesn't able to resist my bunnies tendency to chew. Sorta disappointed of the carryon & my bunny for slowly distorting it. I don't know whether I should indulge on this again because of the price or find another. I like the style & how it has the soft fur inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jonace

customer_reviews.title: My kitty travels with me and she loves the fact ...
customer_reviews.text: My kitty travels with me and she loves the fact that she can stretch out in this as we travel along. It's even large enough when opened for a small bowl of kibble for her to munch on.
customer_reviews.author: Suzziie of CA

customer_reviews.title: Great pet carrier, just what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: Great pet carrier, just what i wanted. My 2 dauchsons fit in each carrier perfectly. I took this on a jetblue flight to costa rica with my dauchsons in each carrier. My larger dog weights 17lbs and fit just fine. I had no problem with the airline or the flight.
customer_reviews.author: Pepe

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Loved the size, construction and expandability. But the ends were too rigid to allow any degree of compression to fir under an airline seat. Had to return it and lose $7 for the privilege of seeing it.
customer_reviews.author: athenian

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, idea but quality may be not so good...
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this was really nice bag. After 2 uses, I noticed the top zipper area seams are already tearing apart. I don't know if I received the defective one or the quality is not that great as I just noticed it. And no, it's not the dog as the dog I have is 1 month old puppy which is always too calm to do anything yet...
customer_reviews.author: AhmazonGuru

customer_reviews.title: Cats already love it
customer_reviews.text: We just received the carrier and although we haven't actually used yet, I'm already impressed with the product (as are our cats!) Within minutes of taking it out of the box, our cat was inside making himself at home. I particularly like the expanding sides, which will give him more space when we're using it traveling. The carrier appears to be very well made. We initially bought just one to test out before getting another for our other cat. We will definitely be getting another!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Puuurfect!
customer_reviews.text: This case is puuuurfect! Moved from NY to FL with my very fat cat. The expanding sides and top opening gave him plenty of space and good views during our roadtrip.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Ehrensberger

customer_reviews.title: Look no further!!!
customer_reviews.text: We traveled from D.C. to Chios, Greece round trip and my fur baby loved it. A lot of space, ventilation and easy to carry. I recommend this carrier to everyone. Fits comfortable under your seat!!! My dog slept in his back and side with his legs up the whole trip.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Agouridis

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: Will be traveling with my son soon. And I’m super glad I found something big enough for him. One of the zippers was acting kind of funky, hoping it’s not a problem! Overall, good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Austin Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: No need to keep searching
customer_reviews.text: The best and we have tried several double carriers. So cozy with the great side fleece linings and it is sturdy and well made with smooth zippers. Our 2 cats love it. When it is cold out, you can zip up one side and still have plenty of room. When I carry it, I zip up both sides and they still have room. I purchase a lot of things from Amazon and have never written a review, but the people who made this really put care into it. They deserve praise and from me, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: TGFC

product_meta.title: Jet Sitter Luxury Soft Sided Pet Carrier
product_meta.description:
Size:Wings V4 Large (19" L x 12" W x 12" H)| Color:Dark GrayJet Sitter Luxury Pet Carrier - for your jet setting pet

"The Best Gets Better!"

JET SITTER WINGS VERSION 4
Completely redesigned with first ever exclusive Panoramic Roof!

ADJUSTABLE SEAT BELT BUCKLES
First of its kind. Simply unbuckle the straps, wrap the car seat belt around the Jet Sitter, then re-buckle and tighten. Your pet will be super secure.

NO-SAG ROOF DESIGN
Built in crossbars support the roof so it doesn’t collapse on your pet. Crossbars are also removable to allow you to shape the carrier underneath the airplane seat!

VELCRO COMFORT HANDLE
Why have the straps dig into your hands? We feature a comfort handle to ease the pain of traveling.

RUBBER FOOT PADS
Jet Sitter does not belong on the ground. Elevate and stay clean.

LUGGAGE HANDLE HOLDER
Quickly slide over your luggage handles and fly through the terminal.

FOLDABLE FOR STORAGE
Folds flat so you can store it away at home or at the hotel.

STRETCH MESH POCKET
Store items like pet toys, food, and your own personal belongings.

PLUSH REMOVABLE FLEECE CARPETING
Super soft, removable and machine washable. 

STRONG SBS SELF LOCKING ZIPPERS
Self Locking Zippers are ultra high quality and will not fray or rip.

Jet Sitter is soft-sided so you can shape it under airplane seats and expand one side for leg room. But please check with your airline prior to your trip.

This size is for pets up to 15 lbs.
feature_bullets: VERSION 4 DESIGN - Loaded with new features! Improved Soft Sided Pet Carriers for under seat in cabin. Simply press the roof down slightly. Fits Small to Medium Dogs and up to Medium Cats. Holds pets up to 15 pounds. Use MEASUREMENTS not your pet's weight.

LUXURY PET CRATE - For puppy, kitten, rabbit, guinea pig, hamsters! Super plush fleece mat padding with stiff board to support heavier pets, upgraded fabrics and hardware. Large Mesh Pocket and Expandable Sides can store treats, food containers, water bowls, toys, accessories, disposable poop waste bags.
EXCLUSIVE PANORAMIC ROOF - First of its kind, full scratch resistant roof for easier access. Fold flat to store under your bed, closet, or suit case when not in use.
TRAVEL SAFELY - Attached Seat Belt Buckles and Luggage Loop help fasten our carrier kennel in your car. Also includes Secure Leash inside to hold back escape artists.
JET SITTER GUARANTEE - Please contact "Sugar Loaf Home Goods" for replacements or service. 1 Year Factory Warranty.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
